text: O vy, kto veruyet! Svidetel'stvuya pred Allakhom, Vy bud'te stoyko-spravedlivy. I pust' ikh nepriyazn' k vam Ne otklonit vas ot (resheniy) spravedlivykh. Blyudite (strogo) spravedlivost', - Ved' eto blizhe k blagochestiyu (stoit). Strashites' razgnevit' Allakha, - Poistine, On svedushch v tom, chto delayete vy
